dmca.title: [ABUSE] URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, December 18, 2004 12:59 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Rosenfield, Kevin (SEA) <KRosenfield@prestongates.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, December 14, 2004, 8:04:15 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============

I am an attorney for Valve Corporation.  Thank you for your prompt
attention to this matter.  I look forward to your confirmation that the
infringing material has been removed from your systems.

 <<KA1RL20BW==The Planet DMCA.doc>>

Kevin A. Rosenfield
PrestonlGateslEllis LLP

925 Fourth Ave, Suite 2900
Seattle, Washington  98104-1158

Phone        (206) 370-6586 (direct)
Fax        (206) 370-6309 (direct)

email        krosenfield@prestongates.com


===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBw9UqvK/XpJs6oyURAt91AKCbqS9/dGqp24L4NTlJ5Z5Ma7e8vQCdF1eH
PoshVZXXBiWWtI6mDZEVQj0=
=6ACE
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----Kevin A. Rosenfield
krosenfield@prestongates.com
206-370-6586




December 14, 2004



URGENT/IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway - Suite 110
Dallas, TX   75207
abuse@theplanet.com

Re:  DMCA NOTICE OF ALLEGED COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

Dear The Planet Internet Services, Inc.:
	
This letter serves as notification under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Preston Gates Ellis LLP (For Valve Corporation)
